sentences.en: But analysts outside the country were unconvinced.
sentences.cn: 但外界的分析家并不认同这样的说法.

sentences.en: But many people at the hearing and in dealerships across the country are unconvinced.
sentences.cn: 但他们的辩解并不能使听证会上的大多数人以及遍布全美的经销商们信服.

sentences.en: But many people at the hearing and the deal ships in dealerships the country are unconvinced.
sentences.cn: 但是这个说法却不能让许多参加听证会的人和全国的经销商信服.

sentences.en: But many people at the hearing hearing and in dealerships across country the country are unconvinced.
sentences.cn: 但在听证会上的许多人以及全国的销售商并不信服.
但他们如果仍然不相信,怎么办?

sentences.en: I remain unconvinced that the idea will work.
sentences.cn: 我还是不相信这个想法可行。

sentences.en: I was unconvinced by the teacher's criticism.
sentences.cn: 我对老师的批评感到不服气.

sentences.en: Many academics remain unconvinced of the need for change.
sentences.cn: 许多学者仍怀疑是否有变革的需要。

sentences.en: Martin was unconvinced, but let the matter drop.
sentences.cn: 马丁并不那么信服, 但也不再提这件事了.

sentences.en: Most consumers seem unconvinced that the recession is over.
sentences.cn: 大多数消费者似乎都不相信经济衰退已经过去。

sentences.en: Some Olympic officials and athletes remain unconvinced.
sentences.cn: 一些奥运会官员和运动员却仍然又顾虑.

sentences.en: Unconvinced, some Olympic teams are staying away from Beijing until the last minute.
sentences.cn: 这话并不能使一些参赛队信服, 他们(已决定)不到最后一刻决不现身.

trans.tran_cn: 不能令人信服的，怀疑的
trans.tran_en: not persuaded that something is true or good
